channel.title: A story about control and ⌘ - Album on Imgur

item.title: A story about control and ⌘ - Album on Imgur
item.author: Theo Jones
item.description: "People asked why Apple uses the Command key for shortcuts, and not Control, even though there is a Control key present. I now attempt to explain. It's a bit of a brain dump, so sorry if it's a bit difficult to navigate. I'm not good at this sort of thing. There's some mildly interesting info in here, but in case of tl;dr: One of the Steves (probably Woz) wanted to be purist about the use of the Control key for generating control characters on the Apple IIe, so added a new key for use with application shortcuts, and the rest is history."
